resources.string: This demo app is intended to help developers get up and running with the Zendesk SDK by providing a working example of the software, and providing some useful actions to explore the end-user experience.
Initializes the Zendesk SDK with the channel key specified in the demo source code. Initializing will load your settings, and prepare the SDK to show a conversation.
The Zendesk SDK allows authentication of end users so their identity can be trusted by agents using Zendesk.

Displays the conversation screen for the initial conversation created for your user. A user and a new conversation will automatically be created if they don\'t exist. Ensure you have previously initialized the Zendesk SDK.
